item.industry_mod.wire_copper.desc0:
§7Component used in cable reels to connect two points.
§e[§fClick-Right+Shift§e]§7 for more information.
item.industry_mod.connection_changer.des:
§7An easy-to-use tool for changing the mode of a cable connector.
§e[§fShift§e]§7 to change mode.
item.industry_mod.connection_changer.err: §cThe connector has connections or is the parent of other. unlink them to replace it.
item.industry_mod.cable_roll.desc0:
§7Component used to wind the cable of a specific material to connect two points.
§e[§fShift§e]§7 for more information.
item.industry_mod.cable_roll.desc1:
§7The amount of thread is determined by the durability of the item.

§6Distance: §7%s for block
§6Efficiency: §a%s

§6Cable Material: §7%s
